segment.source: The Windows Store exposes several services that you can call via REST APIs to programmatically access certain types of data for apps that are registered to your or your organization''s Windows Dev Center account.
segment.target: The Windows Store exposes several services that you can call via REST APIs to programmatically access certain types of data for apps that are registered to your or your organization''s Windows Dev Center account.

segment.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
segment.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

segment.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive \]
segment.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive \]

segment.source: The Windows Store exposes several services that you can call via REST APIs to programmatically access certain types of data for apps that are registered to your or your organization's Windows Dev Center account.
segment.target: The Windows Store exposes several services that you can call via REST APIs to programmatically access certain types of data for apps that are registered to your or your organization's Windows Dev Center account.

segment.source: Use the Windows Store analytics API to programmatically retrieve analytics data for apps that are registered to your or your organization's Windows Dev Center account.
segment.target: Use the Windows Store analytics API to programmatically retrieve analytics data for apps that are registered to your or your organization's Windows Dev Center account.

segment.source: This API enables you to retrieve data for app and IAP acquisitions, app failures, app ratings and reviews.
segment.target: This API enables you to retrieve data for app and IAP acquisitions, app failures, app ratings and reviews.

segment.source: View and grant products from a service
segment.target: View and grant products from a service

segment.source: If you have a catalog of apps and in-app products (IAPs), you can use the Windows Store collection API and Windows Store purchase API to access ownership information for these products from your services.
segment.target: If you have a catalog of apps and in-app products (IAPs), you can use the Windows Store collection API and Windows Store purchase API to access ownership information for these products from your services.
